channel.title: Ya'll wanted private servers...Here they are,
channel.description:
Ok ok you all want a private server right? Well I have discovered one, and its completely free! All you have to do is get on the German Servers....NOBODY gets on the german servers, making it virtually private.
Edit: I must add in that the german words are generally similar to the english version(i.e lade = load) basically just plug that word in with the word u would normally see.

item.title: Ya'll wanted private servers...Here they are,
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

hmm yeah, even thoough i cant get on them, i still understant the german cause i had taken it at school. lol you just need to go into control panel > languages > change it all to german xD

Read full topic
item.source: Ya'll wanted private servers...Here they are,
